ErrorsCodes.400: The server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.
ErrorsCodes.401: The client must authenticate itself to get the requested response.
ErrorsCodes.403: The client does not have access rights to the content; that is, it is unauthorized, so the server is refusing to give the requested resource.
ErrorsCodes.500: The server has encountered a situation it does not know how to handle.
